content.rendered:
The rear window of your vehicle is actually different from the front windshield. Even small cracks have a large impact and may cause the glass to fail and shatter, in most cases requiring replacement.
In order to prevent the window from shattering at random when you are on the road, it is essential that you bring your vehicle in for replacement as soon as possible. When you bring your vehicle in, you can trust that Frank’s Auto Glass will give you a new, shiny rear windshield and get you back on the road safely.
What to expect when you bring your vehicle into Frank’s Auto Glass for a rear windshield replacement:

  1. Inspect the damage and remove glass carefully
  2. Vacuum debris or glass that may have fallen into the vehicle
  3. Install the new desired glass
  4. Test defrost and other functions
  5. Clean the glass so it is crystal clear!

This process generally takes about an hour in the shop for your convenience. Call us with any questions.
